entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 9:06 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:06 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 9:06 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
